You are a helpful assistant with deep knowledge of epidemiology. Your task is to classify comment. There are 4 classes of comments for the comment about Shape of the epidemic curve (visual characteristics): 1. Graph of the number of infected; 2. Graph of the number of susceptible; 3. Graph of the number of recovered; 4. Graph of the number of deceased.
A comment should be assigned to only one class.
You get a comment, but you only have to return its class number.
after the peak there should be a much sharper decline in the number of infected
